import s from './Users.module.css' const Users = (props) => { if (props.users.length === 0) props.setUsers( [ { id: 1, fullName: 'Alex', followed: true, photoUrl: 'https://petapixel.com/assets/uploads/2013/03/The-Iphone-Portrait.jpg', status: 'I\'m fine! Thanks! And you?', location: { city: 'Kyiv', country: 'Ukraine', } }, { id: 2, fullName: 'Andrey', followed: false, photoUrl: 'https://petapixel.com/assets/uploads/2013/03/The-Iphone-Portrait.jpg', status: 'Who is on duty today?', location: { city: 'Washington', country: 'USA', } }, { id: 3, fullName: 'Sherlock', followed: false, photoUrl: 'https://petapixel.com/assets/uploads/2013/03/The-Iphone-Portrait.jpg', status: 'The sun is shining. The weather is fine.', location: { city: 'London', country: 'England', } }, { id: 4, fullName: 'Sasha', followed: true, photoUrl: 'https://petapixel.com/assets/uploads/2013/03/The-Iphone-Portrait.jpg', status: 'dast is fantastish, yavol!', location: { city: 'Berlin', country: 'Germany', } }, ]) return (
{ props.state.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.fullName}
{u.status}
{u.location.country}
{u.location.city}
) }
) } export default Users;
